Hello world

Let's generate a few random numbers:

```{python}
import random
rand_1 = random.randint(1, 500)
```

```{python}
rand_2 = random.randint(1, 999)
```

```{python}
rand_3 = random.randint(500, 999)
```

Here's the list:

```{python}
data = [rand_1, rand_2, rand_3]
data
```

And a piechart:

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.pie(data, labels=["A", "B", "C"])
plt.show()
```
